conbody.p: conversation modeIn this mode the teacher can enter a conversation with a student, a group of students, or the whole class.
An icon ( ) will appear on panel of a student in conversation with the teacher mode.
Select Conversation form the student pop-up menu (see section ) to enter a conversation with this particular student.
Press Activity button in the group tab (see section ), and select Conversation to enter conversation with a group.
Press Activity button in the class tab (see section ), and select Conversation to enter conversation with the whole class.
conbody.note: Conversation mode can also be used to make announcements to a group or the whole class.
conbody.p: Repeat the action described above to exit the conversation mode.
